summary: **Guinness World Records** is a famous book that lists amazing human achievements and natural wonders. It was started in 1955 by Sir Hugh Beaver and the McWhirter twins. The book became very popular and is now published in many countries and languages. It has over 53,000 records and is the main source for tracking world records. The company also makes money by helping people and organizations set new records for publicity. However, some people criticize this practice.
title: Guinness World Records
